abstract_summ: Cross-section study included children positive for COVID-19 admitted to 46 North American PICUs between March 14 and April 3, 2020 . Forty patients (83%) had significant preexisting comorbidities; 35 (73%) presented with respiratory symptoms and 18 (38%) required invasive ventilation . At the completion of the follow-up period, 2 patients had died and 15 (31%) were still hospitalized .
